name: Nordwand Light Hardshell Hooded Jacket - Women's

features: Highly breathable and very abrasion-proof 3-layer Drytechnology® Performance material
Mammut Single Pull Hood™: storm-proof, helmet-compatible hood with reinforced peak, can be adjusted both vertically and horizontally with a single pull
High-quality flat chinguard and zipper underlay
Backpack-compatible external chest pocket with water-repellent zipper and gear loop
Waterproof Ykk Vislon® 2-way front for smooth operation
Slightly asymmetric cuffs, elastic on the inside
Additional stow bag with carabiner loop
